column3: Fashioned with the aesthetic of a 20th century revolver, the Trailblazer shoots arcing 'Shocker' bullets which damage secondary targets with millions of volts.
One of the finest assault rifles available anywhere. The Planet Stormer is accurate, fast and incredibly versatile.
Thermal SMG. The T7 shoots white hot thermal rounds designed to cause maximum trauma to soft targets
Reliable, accurate. Special Forces standard sidearm.
Most soldiers know Ronson for the 65-a assault rifle. Perfectly balanced stock and narrow bore combine to create a very easy to use and accurate weapon.
The 307 is a big brother to most SMGs in every way. Rapid fire high calibre requires some skill to use. Many have compared its handling to the 20th century Thompson SMG.

Sublight COM2 rifle rounds travel the last metre or so at very high speed through “Centre Of Mass Displacement” technology. Recorded speeds of the 127mm COM2 rounds are close to 100,000 metres per second. Enough to leave a big hole in just about anything.
The MAR-9 shotgun round delivers 3 destructive pellets to targets with often horrifying results.
Designed as a slightly smaller assault weapon for speed and mobility, the Para still packs the stopping power of a full sized assault rifle.
Uses 'shocker' technology to charge up regular MEP rounds to unleash arcs of electrical current on impact. Tens of millions of volts will arc to nearby targets for every shot fired.
On impact, Rancor's MAR-3 Molecular acid round activates and starts to react furiously and relentlessly with the area around it, causing horrific and irreversible damage to most substances.
Infiltration forces and personal security details often use this unremarkable but highly effective submachine gun.
Molecular thermite and white phosphorus make a terrifying combination hot enough to incinerate any soft target. The tar-like residue continues to combust aggressively after the initial burst.
Twin recoilless alternating barrels allow for accuracy and an extremely high rate of fire. One of the most innovative and deadly submachine guns available anywhere.
CM 505 delivers a punishing rate of fire with incredible stopping power. A massive belt of rounds keeps it shooting harder, for longer.
Full auto. Versatility of a pistol but firepower of an SMG. The 205 is a top-shelf sidearm.

Large calibre full-auto pistol. Hard to handle but packs incredible stopping power.
The CM 440 Titan is a large caliber assault rifle. It offers massive stopping power with its tungsten core rounds.
The BabyCOM is an ultra high velocity Light Machine Gun that dreams are made of. Firing special Composite Carbon rounds at 25,000 metres per second has the advantage of tremendous penetration.
The CM 330 has a short barrel, and unique "tearaway" clip system for rapid reloading. Slightly reduced calibre on the 330 improves weight and handling of the weapon.

Not exactly the most subtle sniper rifle, the Jupiter is designed not for stealthy removal of a key target, but the high profile frying of the target and any adjacent bodyguards. True CM showboat style.
The twin-bullet sabot Tombstone is the Smokestack entry into the machine gun class. Closer to an assault rifle than a machine gun the Tombstone packs quite a punch with simply appalling accuracy.
The Lone Star is a magazine fed semi-auto grenade launcher. The most stylish way to reduce objects and organic targets to smouldering rubble by far.
Mix of classic and modern, this triple-barreled machine gun has a walnut stock. Oversized and extremely heavy, it is savagely powerful in the right hands.
Sometimes called 'Hellfire' for the red color of plasma bolts fired from it. Each bolt explodes on impact, making the weapon devastating on tightly packed groups of targets.
The Luftplatzen is a shotgun-sized weapon that fires a solid projectile that bursts into a cone of flame on impact.
Uses intensified microwave energy to destroy organic targets easily.
The Heartburn uses ultra high temperature incendiary rounds to incinerate targets from within. Feels like you've swallowed molten steel. Through the front of your chest.
Shoots 3 bladed disks at high velocity. Hardened titanium-steel alloy edges allow for riccochets around corners. Deadly against unarmoured targets.

Advanced prototype hailed by Rubicon as the 'perfect weapon'. Each of its triple barrels employs a super powerful thermal, ballistic and chemical round.
Extremely heavy but extremely powerful. Fire rate of 100 large caliber rounds per second shreds any target almost instantly.
This amazing assault rifle was pulled from production for cost reasons, but reintroduced for a limited time by Critical Mass to celebrate their 100th anniversary of manufacturing top class weapons.
A terrifying upgrade to the Ronson Flamethrower, the WPX shoots a longer, thinner stream of white hot fire.
HIKS reportedly made only 2 of these weapons, one for each of the founders. Since the zombie war began however they had several hundred more made for use in elite special forces units.
This blunderbuss style weapon has a very wide arc of 10 projectiles, enabling it to clear a room in just a couple of shots.
An elite version of most RIA SMG weapons, reserved for the idle rich. It packs so much punch Rubicon did a limited run at the request of the Trans-Fed.
Rancor have created a truly terrifying weapon in the Torment. White hot motes guided by nano-bots seek out targets automatically, pursuing them unerringly until incinerated.
Jets of molecular superacid can cause instant dissolution of organic matter and metal. Sticky nature of this substance hinders surviving targets movement considerably.
Teknoboom produced a limited run of what some call 'a ridiculous little gun' that can be held like a sidearm but deal damage like a fully sized grenade launcher.

This tri-bullet sabot LMG never saw mass production as the cost per unit was too high, but was reintroduced for a limited time by Critical Mass to celebrate their 100th anniversary of manufacturing top class weapons.
A blaster type gun used on some Starships believed to be too heavy for handheld use. HIKS had a few made for the largest and strongest members of its private security force.

Predecessor to the Poison Claw sidearm, the Vitriol was originally deemed in violation of 4 different Trans-Fed treaties for the use of chemical and biological agents in a weapon of war. Available now for a limited time.
The worlds first and only Cryo Assault Rifle. Once deemed too fancy and expensive for regular use, the 000 Kelvin is incredibly effective against zombies of all types.

The 5X5 is a shotgun from a discontinued line from Ronson. Each round contains 5 tungsten tetrahedra with more stopping power than most assault rifles. It was deemed too dangerous to control for most armed forces.
With no expense spared, Shotlite came up with a powerful variant on their incredibly versatile Supermarine LMG for a limited release only.
The 8A was a prototype of what became RIA 7 and was never produced commercially. Available as a limited run only, this SMG is incredibly effective.
Critical Mass acquired patents for a drill that uses concentrated particle beams. This weapon is the early prototype using that technology.

Light, versatile and packing a huge twin-stream energy punch, Critical Mass R&D guys went above and beyond when they built these bad boys. Deemed too intricate for mass production, grab one now while they are still available.
Existing only as a blueprint until recently, the Quasar is the latest high tech weapon from Critical Mass. Get it while you can.
The twin blade shooting bounce gun eventually became the slower-firing triple shot Shredder. A few modifications to the original prototype however produced this fearsome variant called Ricochet.
The lightest thermal assault rifle money can buy, the Bayonet never saw mainstream production due to safety concerns from overheating. The fears are unfounded however in this limited release edition.
Larger and more powerful version of RIA 50 Sniper Rifle. Shoots huge calibre bullets in bursts of 3, capable of damaging the most heavily armoured targets.
EM acceleration from this gun can send a projectile through just about any target including walls. Highly experimental, highly powerful.

Since the start of the zombie war, Teknoboom developed the most dangerous handheld gun known to man. While half as effective on larger targets, the Zerfallen utilizes the extraordinary JOLT technology to vaporize any number of lesser zombies instantly.
A stream of charged particles seeks the single nearest hostile target and locks onto them until they are fried. The Proton Arc makes eliminating powerful enemies very easy indeed.
Intellegent seeking rounds with EXTREMELY wide spread in Shotlite's prototype Banshee SMG, wears down large groups of enemy hostiles with mass confusion.
Large harpoon projectiles skewer their mark, both hindering movement greatly and causing a mass hemorrhaging of blood
While it may not pack the punch of the average LMG, Rancor's Contagion unleashes a powerful burst of chemicals upon impact raining acidic doom over a small area.
A truely terrifying weapon, each pull of the trigger launches a quick burst of 5 incindiary rockets incinerating anything they come into contact with.
Rather than piercing the Starfury's projectiles fragment upon impact, splitting off in random directions and hitting anything too close.
The perfect tool for propelling any specialist's augmented grenades. Lobs frag grenades to bounce off obstacles and explode after a small delay or upon contact.
Pretty much looks like it shoots bees
A classic design ideal for farmhouse defense.

The 'Fortress Breaker' is Teknoboom's obvious answer to an assault rifle. It doesn't just fire explosive rounds, but rounds carrying  trademarked barrage gel that detonates each time it strikes a target.
Weight is always an issue for flame throwers, Shotlite's solution gives us a unique approach with small bursts of fire over a longer than expected distance.

Some said it was impossible to build a lightweight rocket launcher. Shotlite did what they can to prove them wrong. Firing two smaller rockets may seem like a strange solution but you get a lot bang per kilogram.
A widespread volley of chemically coated rounds to ensure that your targets are sludge one way or the other.
Created in tunnels of the Epilson mines to deal with the pests that roam them. It proved just as useful against zombies.
Xi's atmosphere proved zombies are slowed down by the cold. Take that a step further and coat them in ice!
Originally for keeping the waters around Sigma's platforms free, after the virus got loose, the mines also kept the infected away from important equipment.
Technicians on Zeta have long struggled with lava interfering with mining. Now they're using that knowledge to harness the lava to fight zombies.
The shotgun that shocks - miners on Omicron.

Spitters are a grotesque form whose internal organs have liquified into a potent acid, which it spits out with deadly results.

Bloaters move slowly - their muscle fibers are flooded with a sticky mass containing bile, tallow, and adrenaline. They act as hosts for other mutations, which appear in larval form on death.

Zombdroids are artificially intelligent robots with human skin that have become infected. They are believed to have enabled the virus to cross from organic matter into digital form, whereby Combot was infected.
Before becoming infected, these robotic units were used as private security forces. Now infected, they use their twin full-automatic weapons to carry out Combot's commands instantly.
A large remote-controlled lifting robot used for moving cargo around. Infected Combot can direct them to efficiently attack humans if necessary.
A terrifying immolated giant. Moves slowly, but can project balls of superheated gas that incinerate organic matter instantly. Highly heat resistant.
Military Mech taken over by digital strain of virus. Has an array of deadly weaponry with anti-personnel, anti-materiel capabilities.
Huge mutated human form. Tough enough to shrug off most attacks yet strong enough to tear a man to shreds with little or no effort.
A near perfect viral evolution. The Necrosis is frighteningly fast, strong and deadly. Once destroyed, splits into 3 smaller aspects.
